page.title: 03PLUMTREE HALL (continued)
page.content: The residents don't like modern music but they do like opera and Gilbert and Sullivan. Plumtree's favourite T.V. programmes are Paul Daniels and Mastermind. Mrs. Mellors favourite holiday resorts are Switzerland, Norway and Italy. Her favourite food is a roast and the meals are good. The residents enjoy watching sport like tennis, snooker and football. They have hobbies including reading books e.g. Winnie the Pooh, Flower Fairies and For the Love of a Rose. They also enjoy writing letters.
